PROJECT.NAME: iyEucMavr2-mito
PROJECT.TITLE: Eucera mavromoustakisi, mitochondrial assembly, iyEucMavr2-mito.
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project provides the mitochondrial assembly of Eucera mavromoustakisi. The assembly is provided by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) via the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/).
